title: unable to connect to League of Legends
body: so i was in game when my internet crashed, reset router then tried to reconnect, it keeps saying cant connect to the game, i have tested my chat by messaging my friend who i was playing with and he is getting the messages it just wont let me reconnect to that game. everything else seems to be working normally however the game i was in i had an unusually high ping (330 instead of 44) it was my first gamed since the new patch, anyone else had similar issues? or anyone know how i might be able to fix it? im at a loss as to what is going on

replies.body: What OS do you use and who's your DNS?

If you are disconnected from game and can't reconnect, try closing the client completely and logging in again.  Should take about 30 seconds to do and can often fix this type of connection issue.

Cheers
